Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a device that helps two people communicate over a distance using sound.
The student can show how the string telephone allows people to talk across a distance.
The student can use provided materials, like cups and string, in their drawing to demonstrate how the device works.
The student can include in the drawing how the sound travels from one person's voice through the string to another person's ear.
The student can demonstrate the importance of communication over distances using the device.
The student can highlight key features of the device, such as how sound travels along the string.
The student can reflect on how this technology helps people communicate in different situations.
